name: TypeScript General Best Practices
rules: Enable strict mode in tsconfig.json (strict: true)
Use explicit types for function parameters and return values
Prefer interfaces for object shapes, types for unions/intersections
Use const assertions and as const for literal types
Avoid any type, use unknown for truly unknown types
Use enums sparingly, prefer string literal unions instead
Leverage utility types (Partial, Pick, Omit, Record, etc.)
Use type guards (typeof, instanceof, custom predicates) for type narrowing
Keep types DRY with generics and type inference
Document complex types with JSDoc comments
